show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
On the Project Censored Pacifica show Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips review a selection of the most important news... <!--more--> stories not covered by the corporate media in 2012-13 from the now released Censored 2014 yearbook.
They interview Nolan Higdon regarding his new posting “Disinfo Wars: Alex Jones’ War on Your Mind.” Additionally, they play segments of the newly available award winning documentary Project Censored the Movie—Ending the Reign of Junk Food News including an interview with the late Howard Zinn.
